subText: When customers pay for energy that they can afford at that particular moment, they can limit their usage so that it lasts for the period they want.
This is because they only use what they have paid for and they therefore do not have to worry about the bills at the end of the month.
Customers can still take advantage of TOU tariff rates and slab facility if they have a compatible prepayment meter.
Customers can enjoy 1% rebate on energy charge as per existing tariff order.
